    • Method Detail

      • getTracks

        public java.util.List<Track> getTracks()
        Returns an unmodifiable list of all tracks in this movie. The tracks are ordered as they appeare in the file/stream.
        Returns:
        the tracks contained by this movie

      • getTracks

        public java.util.List<Track> getTracks(Type type)
        Returns an unmodifiable list of all tracks in this movie with the specified type. The tracks are ordered as they appeare in the file/stream.
        Returns:
        the tracks contained by this movie with the passed type

      • getTracks

        public java.util.List<Track> getTracks(Track.Codec codec)
        Returns an unmodifiable list of all tracks in this movie whose samples are encoded with the specified codec. The tracks are ordered as they appeare in the file/stream.
        Returns:
        the tracks contained by this movie with the passed type

      • containsMetaData

        public boolean containsMetaData()
        Indicates if this movie contains metadata. If false the MetaData object returned by getMetaData() will not contain any field.
        Returns:
        true if this movie contains any metadata

      • getMetaData

        public MetaData getMetaData()
        Returns the MetaData object for this movie.
        Returns:
        the MetaData for this movie

      • getProtections

        public java.util.List<Protection> getProtections()
        Returns the ProtectionInformation objects that contains details about the DRM systems used. If no protection is present the returned list will be empty.
        Returns:
        a list of protection informations

      • getCreationTime

        public java.util.Date getCreationTime()
        Returns the time this movie was created.
        Returns:
        the creation time

      • getModificationTime

        public java.util.Date getModificationTime()
        Returns the last time this movie was modified.
        Returns:
        the modification time

      • getDuration

        public double getDuration()
        Returns the duration in seconds.
        Returns:
        the duration

      • hasMoreFrames

        public boolean hasMoreFrames()
        Indicates if there are more frames to be read in this movie.
        Returns:
        true if there is at least one track in this movie that has at least one more frame to read.

      • readNextFrame

        public Frame readNextFrame()
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Reads the next frame from this movie (from one of the contained tracks). The frame is the next in time-order, thus the next for playback. If none of the tracks contains any more frames, null is returned.
        Returns:
        the next frame or null if there are no more frames to read from this movie.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if reading fails
